agilermi.core

Class RMIRegistry.MethodAnnotationRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • agilermi.core.RMIRegistry.MethodAnnotationRegistry
  • Enclosing class:
    RMIRegistry

    public static class RMIRegistry.MethodAnnotationRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    The method register marks remote methods to be executed according the preferred invocation policies. For example, it allows to mark a method to be invoked asynchronously.
    Author:
    Salvatore Giampa'

    • Method Detail

      • isMethodAsynch

        public boolean isMethodAsynch(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Returns the asynchronous status of a remote method.
        See setMethodAsynch(Method, boolean) for more details.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        Returns:
        true if the method is flagged as asynchronous AND its return type is void.
        See Also:
        setMethodAsynch(Method, boolean), resetMethodAsynch(Method), RMIAsynch

      • setMethodAsynch

        public void setMethodAsynch(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                            boolean set)
        Flags a method as asynchronous or not. An asynchronous method, when called on an RMI stub, don't wait for remote execution end. A method can be flagged as asynchronous if and only if its return type is void.

        Setting a method as asynchronous at runtime through this method is equivalent to annotate the same method with the RMIAsynch annotation at compilation time.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        set - true if the method should be asynchronous, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        isMethodAsynch(Method), resetMethodAsynch(Method), RMIAsynch

      • resetMethodAsynch

        public void resetMethodAsynch(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Resets the asynchronous status of a method, that means: if the method is annotated with RMIAsynch annotation, it is set as asynchronous, as synchronous otherwise.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        See Also:
        isMethodAsynch(Method), setMethodAsynch(Method, boolean), RMIAsynch

      • isMethodSuppressingFaults

        public boolean isMethodSuppressingFaults(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Gets the fault suppressing flag of a method.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        Returns:
        true if remote invocation faults are suppressed for the specified method, false otherwise
        See Also:
        RMISuppressFaults, setMethodRemoteFaultsSuppression(Method, boolean), resetMethodRemoteFaultsSuppression(Method)

      • setMethodRemoteFaultsSuppression

        public void setMethodRemoteFaultsSuppression(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                             boolean set)
        Flags the specified method to suppress the remote invocation faults. If a method is flagged for remote invocation faults, it only returns default values, without throwing exception, when a remote invocation fault happens.
        See RMISuppressFaults for more details.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        set - true if the method must suppress remote invocation faults, false otherwise
        See Also:
        RMISuppressFaults, isMethodSuppressingFaults(Method), resetMethodRemoteFaultsSuppression(Method)

      • resetMethodRemoteFaultsSuppression

        public void resetMethodRemoteFaultsSuppression(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Resets the remote invocation faults suppression flag of the specified method. If the method is annotated with RMISuppressFaults, the suppression will be activated, deactivated otherwise.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        See Also:
        RMISuppressFaults, setMethodRemoteFaultsSuppression(Method, boolean), isMethodSuppressingFaults(Method)

      • getMethodCacheTimeout

        public int getMethodCacheTimeout(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Gets the caching timeout of the specified method.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        Returns:
        the cache timeout in milliseconds
        See Also:
        RMICached, setMethodCached(Method, int), resetMethodCachedDefault(Method)

      • setMethodCached

        public void setMethodCached(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                            int cacheTimeout)
        Sets the cache timeout for the specified method.
        See RMICached for more details.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        cacheTimeout - the cache timeout in milliseconds
        See Also:
        RMICached, getMethodCacheTimeout(Method), resetMethodCachedDefault(Method)

      • resetMethodCachedDefault

        public void resetMethodCachedDefault(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Resets the cache timeout for the specified method. If the method is annotated with the RMICached annotation, it will be cached, not cached otherwise.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        See Also:
        RMICached, getMethodCacheTimeout(Method), setMethodCached(Method, int)

      • getMethodAlternativeRemoteException

        public java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception> getMethodAlternativeRemoteException(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Get the exception class alternative to RemoteException for the specified method.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        Returns:
        the execption class that replaces the RemoteException on faults
        See Also:
        RMIRemoteExceptionAlternative, setMethodAlternativeRemoteException(Method, Class), resetMethodAlternativeRemoteException(Method)

      • setMethodAlternativeRemoteException

        public void setMethodAlternativeRemoteException(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                                java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception> exceptionClass)
        Set the exception class alternative to RemoteException for the specified method.
        See RMIRemoteExceptionAlternative for more details.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        exceptionClass - the alternative exception class
        See Also:
        RMIRemoteExceptionAlternative, getMethodAlternativeRemoteException(Method), resetMethodAlternativeRemoteException(Method)

      • resetMethodAlternativeRemoteException

        public void resetMethodAlternativeRemoteException(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Resets the alternative remote exception class for the specified method. If the method is annotated with RMIRemoteExceptionAlternative, it will throw the exception specified in the annotation, the RemoteException otherwise.
        Parameters:
        method - the remote method
        See Also:
        RMIRemoteExceptionAlternative, getMethodAlternativeRemoteException(Method), setMethodAlternativeRemoteException(Method, Class)
